title: League of legends breaking my internet
body:
This isn't a qq about oh league is lagging no I mean it actually breaks my internet it happened around patch 6.15 and ever since when I download league of legends it stops my internet as in stops connection and the only way to get internet back is by restoring my computer this also only happens during downloading league of legends and downloading any other applications wont  cause this.



I really wanna play league but I cant woe is me :C

replies.body: If I understand your issue correctly, whenever you run league your internet shuts down.  If this is the case then there may be an issue with your network or hardware problem becoming unresponsive for some reason.  As a first step, I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up.  Let me know if the issue persists, including more details on what you're seeing and when!
